contextId.occurrenceNote: Yahweh is speaking about his own voice. His voice represents what he says. Alternate translation: "my voice" or "what I say" (See: [[rc://en/ta/man/translate/figs-123person]] and [[rc://en/ta/man/translate/figs-metonymy]])
contextId.glQuote: the voice of Yahweh your God

contextId.occurrenceNote: Yahweh switched between the first and third pronoun to refer to himself. Here both "he" and "I" refer to Yahweh. (See: [[rc://en/ta/man/translate/figs-123person]])
contextId.glQuote: he will bless ... I will remove

contextId.occurrenceNote: God is speaking about himself. Alternate translation: "I, Yahweh, am God, and I am merciful and gracious" (See: [[rc://en/ta/man/translate/figs-123person]])
contextId.glQuote: Yahweh, Yahweh, God is merciful and gracious

contextId.occurrenceNote: Yahweh is speaking about himself. Alternate translation: "But I will" (See: [[rc://en/ta/man/translate/figs-123person]])
Yahweh is speaking about himself. Alternate translation: "I will by no means clear the guilty" (See: [[rc://en/ta/man/translate/figs-123person]])
contextId.glQuote: he will by no means clear the guilty
